game.description: Retrieve the lost artifact from the hidden dungeon and return it safely.
game.reward: The Sage's Blessing (Increased wisdom and exp)

tasks.description: Travel to the abandoned Lost Grove to find the entrance to the hidden dungeon.
Clear the hidden dungeon of any hostile forces and retrieve the lost artifact.
Return the artifact to Ancient Sage Zephyros in the central city.

game.title: The Lost Artifact
